_metadata.description: Historical annual average exchange rates (1 unit of currency = X USD)
_metadata.methodology: Annual averages computed from daily reference rates published by central banks
_metadata.note: 2024 rates are based on YTD averages through Q3. 2025+ rates are projections and subject to revision.

_notes.EUR: Based on ECB euro reference exchange rates. 2015-2016 sharp depreciation due to ECB quantitative easing.
_notes.GBP: Based on Bank of England spot rates. 2016 drop reflects Brexit referendum result (June 23, 2016).
_notes.JPY: Based on Bank of Japan rates. Recent depreciation (2022-2024) due to BoJ maintaining ultra-low interest rates while Fed hiked.
_notes.CNY: Based on People's Bank of China reference rates. Note: CNY is managed float with capital controls, not free-floating.
limitations: These are period averages - actual rates vary daily
Rates don't reflect transaction costs, spreads, or fees
For financial applications requiring precision, use real-time forex data
Currency conversions combined with inflation adjustments involve economic assumptions
